apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji depicts a tender kiss between a man with no skin tone variation and a woman with a medium-dark skin tone, their faces softly touching with rosy cheeks. The glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights on their lips and cheeks create a palpable sense of affection and intimacy, typical of Apple's warm design language. This emoji is a clear and heartfelt representation of romantic connection and a loving gesture in digital communication.
